Note 3 to entry: DRP-providers can take many forms including not- for-profit, for-profit and public entities. An association (3.1) can also be a DRP-provider. Note 4 to entry: In this document, instead of the term DRP-provider, the term “provider” is used. [SOURCE: ISO 9000:2015, 3.2.7, modified — Note 4 to entry has been modified.]
